And as she did all over the Infecticon second base autoguns began to 
rise. Inside Blight opened a visual transmission to Shivah and all of 
Blackfortress, one that showed Alecto in the water.

Blight: "Behold a sample of the might of this base!"

And with those words said green bolts of electricity fire down from 
Blight's fingers towards the console in front of him. Outside 10 of 
the bases autoguns(which isnt much, the base has a ton), open fire on 
electo with 5 shots each, sending a total of fifty autogun blasts at 
her. This same visual was being played to darkfate on the wall of his 
cell.

Elsewhere, Windlord's shots are halted by a barrier of chaochitan 
energy which then dissapeared afterwards. A second later he fires a 
thin beam of chaochitan energy at Windlord as he sends a com to 
Unitron.

Vampiza: "Come with me... I can take you all to a safe place. I have 
been instructed to help you survive this battle. However, we are 
vastly outnumbered."
